title: Respond to a Vehicle Breakdown
description: A bus driver reports a mechanical failure. A dispatcher must manage the situation by sending a replacement bus and maintenance crew.

tasks.description: Receive a radio call from a driver reporting a breakdown and their location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the breakdown event, including the vehicle number and location.

tasks.description: Dispatch a road supervisor and a maintenance crew to the bus's location.
Identify a spare bus and dispatch it to the location to pick up the stranded passengers and continue the route (a 'bus bridge').
tasks.expected_outcome: A replacement bus is dispatched to maintain service.
